name: Lure - Lure Utilizes Regular Expressions
short_description:
Lure - Lure Utilizes RegEx
Use the JDK 1.4+ RegEx packages (java.util.regex) with earlier versions of the JDK.  This port provides the sleek new RegEx interface and all it's functionality and makes it available to those stuck in the older JDK versions.
